title: Salmon and Dill Dip
ingredients: ['225g cream cheese, softened', '125ml soured cream', '50g butter, softened', '2 tablespoons chopped roasted red peppers', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon grated onion', '1 (213g) tin salmon, drained, bones and skin removed', '1/4 teaspoon dried dill']
